storyInfo: After rescuing Juana, Thorns heads to the alchemy lab to retrieve his tools, encountering Anastasio in search of the compass. He escapes by triggering an explosion. The crew then flees toward Skeletal Reef to evade their pursuers.

attributes.content: Chaval.
Teach? What's going on?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Javier led the Inquisition to us. Señora Juana is being held captive in the captain's quarters.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Why did you come back?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I don't know... Same reason as you, probably.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Wait... is that one of your friends hiding on the opposite deck?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Huh? Is that Isidro? I guess he really did come back.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: See, I told you. I mean, even I couldn't stay away.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Of course he'd come back when he saw the fire. He's my best amigo, after all!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What about me?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Why did I have to come too?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Um, to help put out the fire?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Wake up, señora!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Perlita... Where's Nene? You shouldn't have come back.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I set it free in the Flat. It may be weak, but better out there than getting killed by mutineers.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: We can't just leave you here.
attributes.name: Teach
Teach
attributes.content: You don't look well...

attributes.name: Teach
attributes.content: What did they do to you?!
Nothing... just gave me some drugs.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You could have fled. You would have lived.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I didn't take you for someone who would give up so easily.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Now that we're all here, don't we have better things to do than just talk? You know the Salt Flat better than anyone else, señora. Is there anywhere we can go?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How big is our group?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Twenty-four.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Excelente. Enough to commandeer a ship.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Which one?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: La Conquista.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That's the oldest one, slower than the newer salt ships.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: But I know it best.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Besides, because they consider it an antique, it will be lightly guarded. All the easier for us.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'll take eight men up to the deck and get rid of the sentries. The others will go in through the side with Elysium and deal with the rest.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: What about me?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Stay with Señora Juana. She's... not at her best, and won't be able to move as quickly.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What's that noise?
attributes.name: Alert Sailor

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Alert Sailor

attributes.content: Ngh—
attributes.name: Patrolling Sailor

attributes.content: My aching bones... Maybe I'm getting too old for this.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: The guys on the deck are out cold. I tossed 'em overboard.
attributes.name: Trustworthy Sailor

attributes.content: Good. Climb the mast and be ready to hoist the sail at my command. We'll need full speed on the double.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: You done over there?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: We got the ones below deck.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: A hand, please.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Now we wait for the boss.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Search inch by inch. By the Alguacil's orders, we must find the compass.
attributes.name: Serious Warrior Priest

attributes.content: We've turned every room upside down, but haven't found anything remotely like it.
attributes.name: Reliable Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Keep looking. Don't miss a single nook or corner.
attributes.name: Serious Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Reliable Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Señores, the Alguacil has issued new orders. A squad is to come with me to pursue the fleeing alchemist.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And why are you the one delivering the order?
attributes.name: Serious Warrior Priest

attributes.content: What's wrong with that? We're still working together according to our agreement.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Very well. Wait here while we muster the men.
attributes.name: Reliable Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Gracias.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: What is Javier doing over here?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: No idea, but he's gotten rid of the warrior priests for us, even if he didn't mean to.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: When they leave, we can continue behind those tents.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: They won't be able to see us from any of the salt ships.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I can see you've become an expert at sneaking through our base.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Hang on. We're almost there.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Go on to the deck first. I need to fetch something from the lab.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Be quick.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: A ship from the old era...
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Does your desire for the compass point towards the source of the calamity, the ocean?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Where did I leave it...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: ...You.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It is you who has been leading the raids.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: And it is you who has been repairing the compass.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: People always tell me to look for the good in others.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: The truth always proves them fools. When first we met, I knew you intended to take the compass for your own sinful alchemical research.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I was right.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: The compass is no more. I'm still trying to scrape what's left of it off the transmutation table.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: That black mud? No, that is not the true compass. Your lies have no purchase here.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Must the Inquisition spill so much blood for each thing it loses?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You know that the compass corrupts the heart.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: It's nothing more than a tool for sailing the seas.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Sailing the seas. Hah.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Those who attempt to elude both judgment and the reins of morality often seek out thorny paths that few have walked, and distant shores that none have reached.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: As if their accomplishments could offer sanctuary for their sins.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I don't recall sinning.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Harboring a thief, feeding upon the remains of the townsfolk, assaulting a cleric of the Inquisition, associating with bandits who menace the town... Is that not enough?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Pretexts and framed crimes.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: And now you begin to deny your sins.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: All who have sinned will desperately deny it. I was no exception.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: But I learned to accept my sins, and thus discovered the path of atonement.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: My life was born from the evils of cannibalism. My very being is a sin. I am unworthy of the liberation of death.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: But you were once pure and upright, before desire corrupted you. You have the right to die.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I will free you.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: You're insane...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I don't have time for this!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Strange. Why isn't Isidro here?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's all right. He must be somewhere on the ship, so everybody's accounted for.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Just waiting on your orders, señora.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Hoist the sails.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We sail.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: This ship...
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: (Mierda, Juana doesn't know this lunatic is in here!)
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (He'll be nothing but trouble once the ship starts moving.)
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Everyone involved in this futile escape attempt is on this ship, correct?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Shut it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: This is where it ends for all of you, along with this sinful vessel of the old era.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: The Alguacil's attacks are ferocious. All Isidro can do is defend himself.
(This is getting me nowhere... I have to do something...)
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: This is his own lab. There must be something he can do here.
What does he do best?
During the time he spent here, his most frequent creations were undoubtedly explosions of various sizes.
Explosions...
This calls for an explosion.
*cough* *cough* Argh! Ugh!
...Thorns?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Finally! You were starting to scare me when you went down to the lab and didn't come back.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I ran into someone from the Inquisition there.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I thought we cleaned out the cabins.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I don't know how he got there. He just came in all of a sudden looking for the compass, and wasn't in a mood to negotiate.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I had to blow up the lab to eject him from the ship.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Him and half of this ship!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Good work.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Is there anything from the lab left, though?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Maybe?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Very well...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We're going into the Skeletal Reef. The ocean lies just beyond that.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You might have one last chance to repair the compass before we arrive.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: S-Señor Silver! The Alguacil is still on that ship! We must come to his aid!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: No one could survive an explosion like that.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But the Alguacil...
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: I said, no.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Will we let his martyrdom go to waste, sacrificing the living for the sake of the departed?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But what if he's still—
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Aarón needs you now more than ever. Take inventory of the confiscated supplies, and round up the prisoners.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: This is an order.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Steady! You're gonna snap the mast in two!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Are you trying to crash the ship on those bones and have us hang on them to dry like human jerky?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Full left rudder!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: —Full left rudder!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Damage to the starboard side! Another hit from a steam blast, and this ship's going to fall apart!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: The skeleton formations are getting denser! We'll crash if we don't steer this just right!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The erupting steam means we're close to the Skeletal Reef.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: They won't dare go in there!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: But do we? The steam blasts will punch through us like a hot knife through butter!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Better than the Inquisition, at least!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: ...Ugh!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Boiling steam shoots out of gaps in the skeletons and tears the sail apart with terrible force.
The gang is thrown into the air before crashing back onto the deck.
The helm wheel spins wildly out of control. Gushing steam sends the ship crashing towards a massive skeleton more than a dozen meters tall!
Juana says nothing, as if waiting for something.
Weedy! You're an engineer! Do something!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: This is my first time on a Golden Age ship, never mind one that's been modified beyond recognition! I need time to figure out how it works!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Do we abandon ship? We might survive if we jump right now!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Are you loco?! You'll be impaled by saltfins in less than a minute!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: —Señora!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: We're done for...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: No, we're not.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana looks towards the spinning helm wheel.

If the ship were alive, its flesh would have been stripped away by a century of wear, leaving only a bare skeleton. Even its once-magnificent embroidered sail was replaced with a patchwork of finskin.
Yet, the helm stands proud at the deck's center.
Juana halts the spinning helm wheel with her hands, as if steadying a dance partner, and begins to turn it with a frenzied rhythm. Her ink-black hair whips around like seaweed caught in raging tides.
It's been so long, old friend!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: La Conquista brushes past the massive skeleton, banking at a dangerous angle. Only by hanging onto a rope for dear life did the passengers avoid being thrown overboard.
For decades, this heavy old ship has had to drift slowly behind other salt ships.
Now, though, it darts through the bones, riding upon the wind, as it once navigated treacherous reefs with Juana at the helm.
Señora...?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: W-We're on course again!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I... I'm alive? Do I have all my body parts? Am I hanging off a piece of bone?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You said... YOU SAID YOU ONLY NEEDED ME TO PUT OUT A FIRE!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Well, figuratively... right?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What's the situation, Thorns? How much of the lab is left?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: They stand in silence before the carnage.
I managed to salvage the transmutation table. The outer casing is gone, but the output's stable enough...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: As for the probes... this is the only one left. Pretty worn, but still usable.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: And we still have a little bit of alloy and Originium, scavenged from the antiques. I don't know if it's enough though...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Anything I can help with?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Are your fingers as thin as a probe needle?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: A long rumble interrupts the conversation as Elysium places a hand on his belly, looking embarrassed.
At this rate, they might be soon. We don't have much food on the ship...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Let's go find some.
attributes.name: Isidro
